com.here.mobility.sdk.core.utils

Class ObjectUploadTask<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.mobility.sdk.core.utils.ObjectUploadTask<E>

  • public abstract class ObjectUploadTask<E>
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class for managing the task that periodically performs the upload for components which collect, store and upload them. Works in tandem with ObjectDiskBuffer. The class is parameterized with the type of extra information required to actually perform the upload.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ObjectUploadTask(java.lang.String taskTag)
      Creates a new ObjectUploadTask with the given task tag (as defined in TaskScheduler).

      Returns whether the owner component is active.

        @WorkerThread
public int onRunTask(@NonNull
                                   android.content.Context context,
                                   E extra)
        Invoked (by TaskScheduler, indirectly) to run any tasks we've asked it to schedule. Returns one of the RESULT_ values in GcmNetworkManager.
